import sys
import math

def solve():
    inp = sys.stdin.readline
    gcd = math.gcd
    n = int(inp())
    cnt = 0
    ans = [0] * n
    s = []
    i = 0
    for x in map(int, inp().split()):
        s.append([x, i])
        for j in range(len(s) - 1, -1, -1):
            x = gcd(s[j][0], x)
            s[j][0] = x
            if j + 1 < len(s) and s[j][0] == s[j + 1][0]:
                s.pop(j + 1)
        for j in range(len(s) - 1, -1, -1):
            if i - s[j][1] + 1 >= s[j][0] and (j + 1 >= len(s) or s[j + 1][1] > i - s[j][0] + 1):
                s = []
                cnt += 1
                break
        ans[i] = cnt
        i += 1
    print(' '.join(map(str, ans)))

def main():
    solve()
main()
